text:
This year in Paris, we have observed a water penury du to the climate changes and this phenomena make people fear other penuries like the electricity one. To reduce the risk of an electricity penury especially during winter where the temperature are very low, the development of the renewables energies can be the solution. The implantation of the solar panels seams to be the best way to convinced people.
First of all, the solar panels are producing electricity from the sun which isn't going to disappear in the next years like the petrol. They can be put almost everywhere and there are a lot of different size from the little one to recharge an object to the giant one in "solar panels farm" to aliment fabrics or houses. The fact to have solar panels over a house is good for the environment but also for reducing the price of the electricity. Indeed, the electricity produce on the roof is use for the house but when it's not use the electricity company can buy it for other houses and of course it means that you are less dependent of the electricity production from the company. Furthermore, the lithium can be recycle.
The solar panels aren't only good things. They are made of lithium that isn't a renewable source and that is very expansive. Moreover, even if the lithium can be recycling like I say before, it is complicated to recycle, in fact it's expansive so a lot of companies don't do it and just throw it up. After that we can ask us if the impact that it's suppose to be good for the planet isn't worst. The price for the solar panels and it installation is expansive and to make them functional they need sun, so when you live in cloudy area, it doesn't seam to be the right solution.
To conclude, I can say that the solar panels aren't by their own the solution to stop the climate changes but are a part of it.
